full_summary:
### Tactical Operational Flight Trainer (TOFT) Throttle Grip Assemblies Procurement

### Project Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a proposal from interested respondents for the procurement of Tactical Operational Flight Trainer (TOFT) Throttle Grip assemblies. The Type of Agreement contemplated by this procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) by competitive bidding.

### Items Required
The following items are required to be delivered by the contractor:
* 5 units of 5-way toggle switch assemblies (Item 1)
* 2 units of slide switches (Item 2)
* 2 units of push button switches (Item 3)
* 5 units of thumbwheels (Item 4)
* 1 unit of toggle switches (Item 5)

### Contractor Instructions
The submitted documents must be in either English or French, as per the Official Languages Act. Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the part number and National Stock Number Classifier (NSCM) / North Atlantic Treaty Organization Supply Classification (NATO SCC) of the product proposed.

### Proposal Submission Details
The proposal submission deadline is January 3, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time. The bid submission must comply with the Government of Canada's terms and conditions.

### Tendering Information
The tender is classified under UNSPSC *Throttle*, and the Procurement Category is *GD* (Goods and Services).

### Eligibility
Only Canadian businesses or organizations are eligible to bid on this contract. 

### Contact Information
All inquiries related to this procurement should be directed to:
Joseph Catanzariti
Phone: (819) 939-4271
Email: [joseph.catanzariti@forces.gc.ca](mailto:joseph.catanzariti@forces.gc.ca)
Please note that the tender notice can be accessed through the Government of Canada's procurement website. The notice was posted on November 23, 2023, and the tender closing date has expired. However, this entry has been provided as a reference for future tendering requirements. 

### Download Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's procurement website: [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25657/w8485-247858-b-eng.pdf). 

*References:
* Canada Buys: [Notice Reference: 25657](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/web
